N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7440.4 - Fire prevention and safety practices and training

State Regulations
(a) The facility director, or person acting
in that capacity, shall designate one or more staff members to conduct regular
fire and safety inspections of all areas of the facility to determine whether a
fire hazard exists, and shall take the necessary action to correct such
hazard. (b) Such inspections shall
be conducted at least once every week, and the results of such inspections
shall be recorded in a facility log maintained for such purpose. (c) Prior to assuming any duties, such
appointed staff member(s) shall have successfully completed appropriate
specialized training approved by the Office of Fire Prevention and
